```py
section .text 
global _start 
_start: 
    mov ecx, 10 
    mov eax, '0' 
    l1: 
    mov [num], eax 
    mov eax, 4 
    mov ebx, 1 
    push ecx 
    mov ecx, num 
    mov edx, 1 
    int 0x80 
    mov eax, [num] 
    inc eax 
    pop ecx 
    loop l1 
    mov eax, 1 
    int 0x80 
section .bss 
    num resb 1
```
